replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Generating a chunk in world world took longer than 10 seconds, Thermos needs to crash so the server doesn't time out...sorry!
生成一个区块在世界world时花了10秒+
服务端主动崩服不会使服务器超时过久?

        Found chunk: true
        Location: World: (725,13,14752), Chunk: (at 5,0,0 in 45,922; contains blocks 720,0,14752 to 735,255,14767), Region: (1,28; contains chunks 32,896 to 63,927, blocks 512,0,14336 to 1023,255,14847)

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Xiaoxinzhi 于 2019-8-22 14:01 编辑 

你可以删除地图来解决，也可以删除单个错误区块。
说地图加载时间过长 重置地图试一试 或者尝试给服务器分配更多资源
